attributes.action: Ensure all premises serving Halal or Kosher meat prominently display signage in ENGLISH that this is the case
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many companies and restaurants are starting to serve meat slaughtered in the Halal method to the general public in order not to offend the religious taste of a minortity of their customers. If Halal or Kosher food is to be served to the general public there should be clear and prominent signage in English visible to the customer prior to his making an order so that an informed choice can be made as to whether he is prepared to condone this method of slaughter. This should apply to all companies serving food.
